item.title: Russian rouble down as top banker predicts it will weaken by year-end

review.headline_rewrite: Russian rouble down as top banker predicts it will weaken by year-end
bullets: dollar on Thursday after the head of Russia's largest bank, Sberbank, predicted the currency will gradually weaken by the end of the year in
The bank's deputy governor, Alexei Zabotkin, said this week that Russia had made substantial progress in fighting inflation but urged caution.
The central bank hiked the key rate to 21% last year, the highest level since the early 2000s, to bring inflation down.

item.title: Soybeans slide on lack of China demand, corn mixed

review.headline_rewrite: Soybeans slide on lack of China demand, corn mixed
bullets: Wheat, meanwhile, fell to fresh contract lows on ample global supplies.
government production forecasts have not adjusted for yield declines from disease pressure in pockets of the Midwest farm belt.
The contract broke through technical chart support at its 100- and 200-day moving averages, but held support around its 50-day average.
CBOT December wheat hit a contract low of $5.14-1/2 a bushel and was down 4-1/2 cents at $5.17-1/2.

item.title: SEBI board set to tighten MII governance rules, review MF activities

item.title: Editorial. GST rate revamp is transformative
